title: Manhattan Penthouse Library
description: A 500-book collection spanning art history, architecture, and modern fiction for a minimalist Upper East Side penthouse. Custom walnut shelving, organized by color gradient.

title: Hamptons Beach House
description: Coastal-inspired collection featuring maritime history, photography books, and light literary fiction. Weathered covers and blue spines complement the ocean views.

title: Brooklyn Brownstone
description: An eclectic mix of vintage cookbooks, poetry, and contemporary design books for a young creative couple. Floor-to-ceiling shelving in a restored 1890s parlor room.
